page.name: Web Cloud
page.page_description: Welcome to the Web Cloud status page for real-time information on system performance and availability.
page.headline: Web Cloud OVHcloud Status : incidents, maintenance
page.notifications_email_footer: You received this email because you are subscribed to Web Cloud's service status notifications.

components.name: Identity, Security & Operations || Key Management Service

incidents.name: [GLOBAL][Collaborative solutions] - Zimbra incident notification
incidents.message: We would like to inform you that we had an incident on our Zimbra offfer. This incident has now been resolved. Here are some supplementary details : Start time : 12/05/2025 11:26 UTC End time : 12/05/2025 11:56 UTC Impacted Service(s) :Some Zimbra Mail were temporarily unreachable. Customers Impact : Customers were temporarily unable to access their mail. Root Cause : This incident was caused by an electrical equipment issue. Ongoing Actions : The incident has been identified and our teams are mobilised to restore service as quickly as possible. We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution. We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

incidents.name: [GRA][Web Hosting] - Cluster026 incident notification

Here is detail for this incident : Start time : 11/05/2025 10:41 UTC End time : 11/05/2025 11:45 UTC Root Cause : This incident is caused by a network equipment issue. We thank you for your understanding and patience throughout this incident.

incidents.name: [Global][Domains] - Domains Name incident notification on .TL
incidents.message: We have determined the origin of the incident affecting our .TL Domains offer, customers in the impacted zone are unable to perform some tasks. Here is detail for this incident : Start time : 09/05/2025 11:30 UTC Impacted Service(s) : Multiple operations (Registration, Renew, Transfer, Restore, Delete) are temporarily unavailable for .TL domains. Customers Impact : Customers are temporarily unable to perform multiple operations (Registration, Renew, Transfer, Restore, Delete). Root Cause : This incident is caused by a software issue. Ongoing Actions : The incident has been identified and our teams are mobilized to restore service as quickly as possible. We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution. We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

We thank you for your understanding and patience throughout this incident.
